name: biomni-analyze-aortic-diameter-and-geometry
title: Biomni: Analyze Aortic Diameter And Geometry
description: Analyze aortic diameter and geometry from cardiovascular imaging.
content:
Overview

This pathology analysis tool measures aortic diameter and geometric parameters from cardiovascular imaging data. The tool processes medical images to quantify vessel dimensions, wall thickness, and geometric characteristics critical for assessing cardiovascular health and detecting aortic abnormalities.

Input Parameters

  • image_path (required): Path to the cardiovascular imaging file (CT, MRI, or ultrasound)
  • output_dir (optional): Directory where analysis results will be saved (default: './output')

Input Format

{
  "image_path": "/path/to/aortic_image.dcm",
  "output_dir": "./results"
}

Biological Use Case

This tool is essential for diagnosing and monitoring cardiovascular diseases including aortic aneurysms, aortic dissection, Marfan syndrome, and atherosclerosis. It provides quantitative measurements for surgical planning, disease progression monitoring, and risk stratification in patients with aortic pathology. Clinical applications include pre-operative assessment for aortic repair and longitudinal surveillance of high-risk patients.

Output

The analysis generates quantitative measurements of aortic diameter at multiple anatomical locations, cross-sectional area, wall thickness, and geometric indices. Results include numerical values, statistical summaries, and annotated visualizations highlighting measured regions. Output files contain structured data for clinical reporting and research documentation.

Category

pathology
